title: codeBASED
summary: Workflows client is a simple project management application designed with React on the front end and Rails on the back end. With the mission to boost your productivity by prioritizing quality over quantity. Transform your work routine and achieve your goals with standout features such as Gamifying your productivity, Setting and achieving milestones and the ability to track progress over time.

title: Workflows Client
summary: Workflows client is a simple project management application designed with React on the front end and Rails on the back end. With the mission to boost your productivity by prioritizing quality over quantity. Transform your work routine and achieve your goals with standout features such as Gamifying your productivity, Setting and achieving milestones and the ability to track progress over time.

title: Ecommerce Web Scraper [Still In Development]
summary: A web scraping application, built using Ruby on Rails, leveraging the power of web scraping technology, the app extracts item listings from Gumtree marketplace. Users have the flexibility to apply custom price markups before publishing the listings onto Facebook Marketplace.

title: City Stays Melbourne
summary: A direct booking website for a vacation rental business. Built using WordPress with personal customizations. Connected to a PMS, it enables direct bookings while synchronizing effortlessly with my OTA calendar (Airbnb, VRBO), preventing any potential double bookings and conflicts.

title: Its A Vibe
summary: Vibe is a mixture of a playlist wizard, a psychologist and that one friend that DJs at all your parties. You tell it how you feel and what you fancy and it makes you a perfect playlist to Vibe to!.

title: Portfolio Website
summary: A dynamic and engaging portfolio website built with Next.js, styled with Tailwind CSS, and animated using Framer Motion. This project offers a modern and responsive platform to showcase my CV and projects, featuring smooth animations, sleek design, and an intuitive user experience.

title: CozyTees
summary: Cozy tees is a two-sided-marketplace application on Rails that facilitates the buying and selling of T-shirts and sporting jerseys. **Unfortunately, Heroku (the hosting platform) stopped their free tier and took down the database. Currently working to get it back up.

title: Alphah Mockup
summary: An E-commerce mock-up website built with React using vanilla CSS. This project showcases a responsive and user-friendly interface, complete with essential e-commerce functionalities such as product listings, detailed product pages and a shopping cart.
